cards.name: Adam Warlock
cards.ability: End of Turn: Draw a card if you're winning here. Otherwise, +1 Power.

cards.name: Agamotto
cards.ability: Game Start: Shuffle 4 Ancient Arcana into your deck.

cards.name: Annihilus
cards.ability: On Reveal: Your cards with Power below 0 switch sides. Destroy those that can't.

cards.name: Black Knight
cards.ability: After you discard a card, add the Ebony Blade to your hand with that card's Power. (once per game)

cards.name: Attuma
cards.ability: End of Turn: Destroy one of your cards here with less Power.

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.ability: End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

cards.name: Blob
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge cards from your deck into this until it gains 13 or more Power.

cards.name: Bruce Banner
cards.ability: End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, 25% chance to HULK OUT!

cards.name: Cannonball
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the highest-Power enemy card here away. If you can't, destroy it with a Rock.

cards.name: Cap's Shield
cards.ability: Ongoing: This can't be destroyed. Give your Cap +2 Power when this moves to Cap's location.

cards.name: Captain Carter
cards.ability: Ongoing: Add this card's Power to your back-row cards here. (can't add to itself)

cards.name: Cobra
cards.ability: Activate: Switch one of your opponent's created cards here to your side.

cards.name: Corvus Glaive
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard 2 cards from your hand to get +1 Max Energy.

cards.name: Cull Obsidian
cards.ability: You can only play this where you have a 1-Cost card.

cards.name: Cyclops
cards.evolved: End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, afflict 2 enemy cards here with -1 Power.

cards.name: Doom 2099
cards.ability: End of Turn: Add a DoomBot 2099 to a random location if you played (exactly) 1 card.

cards.name: Dum Dum Dugan
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your front-row cards here have +1 Power. (can't add to itself)

cards.name: Elixir
cards.ability: Activate: The next time one of your cards is destroyed this turn, revive it here.

cards.name: Elsa Bloodstone
cards.ability: Each card you play to fill your side of a location gains +2 Power.

cards.name: Esme Cuckoo
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy a card from your deck into your hand. Set its Cost to 3 and Power to 4.

cards.name: Eson
cards.ability: End of Turn: Put a created card from your hand here.

cards.name: Fan Fei
cards.ability: Activate: Move your other cards here to the right.

cards.name: Firehair
cards.ability: When one of your cards is destroyed, this uses that card’s On Reveal.

cards.name: Ghost-Spider
cards.ability: On Reveal: The last card you played moves here.

cards.name: Goliath
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each other Ongoing card you have in play.

cards.name: Gorgon
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your opponent’s created cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

cards.name: Havok
cards.ability: End of Turn: You lose 1 Max Energy and this gains +4 Power.

cards.name: Hellion
cards.ability: On Reveal: Next turn, you can move cards to this location.

cards.name: Hercules
cards.ability: The first time another card moves here each turn, move it to another location.

cards.name: Hulk
cards.evolved: End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, +2 Power. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Hydra Bob
cards.ability: End of Turn: This moves if a player Snapped.

cards.name: Hydra Stomper
cards.ability: Ongoing: +1 Power for each time one of your cards moved this game.

cards.name: Infinity Ultron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 of Ultron's Stones to your hand.

cards.name: Kahhori
cards.ability: On Reveal: Each card in your hand gives one of your cards in play +1 Power.

cards.name: Khonshu
cards.ability: When discarded, returns in its next phase. On Reveal: Resurrect a card you discarded to another location with its Power set to 5.

cards.name: Khonshu Waxing
cards.ability: When discarded, returns in its final phase. On Reveal: Resurrect a card you discarded to another location with its Power set to 8.

cards.name: Kid Omega
cards.ability: Activate: Destroy the next card you play this turn to gain its Power.

cards.name: King Eitri
cards.ability: Activate: Draw a created card from your deck.

cards.name: Knull
cards.ability: Ongoing: Has the combined Power of all cards destroyed this game.

cards.name: Lady Deathstrike
cards.ability: On Reveal: Destroy each card here with 3 or less Power.

cards.name: Laufey
cards.ability: On Reveal: Steal 1 Power from each other card here.

cards.name: Loki
cards.ability: On Reveal: Replace your deck with your opponent's starting deck. Give those cards -1 Cost and draw a card.

cards.name: Makkari
cards.ability: End of Turn: Runs from your hand to a random location. (if possible)

cards.name: Marvel Boy
cards.ability: End of Turn: Give 3 of your 1-Cost cards +1 Power.

cards.name: Mercury
cards.ability: You can move this once. Ongoing: Enemy cards here can't move.

cards.name: Misty Knight
cards.evolved: End of Turn: If you have unspent Energy, give one of your other cards +1 Power.

cards.name: M.O.D.O.K.
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard your hand.

cards.name: Mobius M. Mobius
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your Costs can't be increased. Your opponent's Costs can't be reduced.

cards.name: Mockingbird
cards.ability: Costs 1 less for each of your created cards in play.

cards.name: Ms. Marvel
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your adjacent locations with 2+ cards and no repeated Costs have +5 Power.

cards.name: Nebula
cards.ability: Each turn your opponent doesn't play a card here, +2 Power. (except the turn you play this)

cards.name: Nimrod
cards.ability: When this is destroyed, add a copy to each other location.

cards.name: Prodigy
cards.ability: On Reveal: If this is in the back row, copy the text of the card in front of it.

cards.name: Quinjet
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your created cards cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

cards.name: Red Hulk
cards.ability: End of Turn: If your opponent has unspent Energy, +3 Power. (if in hand or in play)

cards.name: Sam Wilson Captain America
cards.ability: Game Start: Add Cap's Shield to a random location. Ongoing: You can move Cap's Shield.

cards.name: Sebastian Shaw
cards.ability: When this card permanently gains Power, gain +2 more Power. (wherever this is)

cards.name: Selene
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict the lowest-Power card in each player's hand with -3 Power.

cards.name: Silk
cards.ability: After ANY card is played here, this moves to another location.

cards.name: Skaar
cards.ability: Costs 2 less for each of your cards that has 10 or more Power.

cards.name: Spider-Ham
cards.ability: On Reveal: Transform the leftmost card in your opponent's hand into a Pig, keeping its Power and Cost.

cards.name: Starbrand
cards.ability: Ongoing: Your opponent has +3 Power at each other location.

cards.name: Strange Supreme
cards.ability: Gains +2 Power from merging. End of Turn: Merge one of your created cards into this.

cards.name: Sunspot
cards.ability: End of Turn: Gain +1 Power for each unspent Energy.

cards.name: Surge
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give the top card of your deck -1 Cost and +1 Power. After you play it, repeat this ability.

cards.name: Thaddeus Ross
cards.ability: End of Turn: If your opponent has unspent Energy, draw a card with 10 or more Power.

cards.name: Thena
cards.ability: End of Turn: +3 Power if you played (exactly) 2 cards.

cards.name: The First Ghost Rider
cards.ability: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-Power card from your hand. Remove that card's Power from this.

cards.name: Topaz
cards.ability: After you play a card here, move it to the middle location.

cards.name: Uncle Ben
cards.ability: When this card is destroyed, replace it with Spider-Man.

cards.name: Ultron Space Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Move the lowest-Power enemy card here to the location of Infinity Ultron.

cards.name: Ultron Reality Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add a Drone here. Set its Power to Infinity Ultron's.

cards.name: Ultron Soul Stone
cards.ability: On Reveal: For each of your full locations, give one of your cards there +2 Power.

cards.name: Werewolf By Night
cards.ability: After you play an On Reveal card at another location, move there to gain +2 Power.

cards.name: Xorn
cards.ability: After ANY 3 or 4-Cost card is played here, move it to another location.

cards.name: Yondu
cards.ability: On Reveal: Banish the card that costs the least in your opponent’s deck.

cards.name: Zabu
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give each 4-Cost card in your deck -1 Cost.

locations.name: Hotel Inferno
locations.ability: After you play a card here this turn, banish the top card of your opponent’s deck.

locations.name: Pit of Exile
locations.ability: Cards with 10 or more Power can't be played here.

items.title: High Voltage
items: The ultra fast game mode with three turns and tons of energy returns. Play and unlock The First Ghost Rider, for FREE!

items.name: Yondu
changes: 1/2 - On Reveal: Destroy the card that costs the least in your opponent’s deck.
1/2 - On Reveal: Banish the card that costs the least in your opponent’s deck.

items.name: Gorgon
changes: 2/3 - Ongoing: Your opponent’s cards that didn’t start in their deck cost 1 more. (maximum 6)
2/3 - Ongoing: Your opponent’s created cards cost 1 more. (maximum 6)

items.name: King Eitri
changes: 1/2 - Activate: Draw a card from your deck that didn’t start there.
1/2 - Activate: Draw a created card from your deck.

items.name: Quinjet
changes: 1/2 - Ongoing: Cards that didn’t start in your deck cost 1 less. (minimum 1)
1/2 - Ongoing: Your created cards cost 1 less. (minimum 1)

items.name: Mockingbird
changes: 6/9 - Costs 1 less for each of your cards in play that didn’t start in your deck.
6/9 - Costs 1 less for each of your created cards in play.

items.name: Hotel Inferno
changes: After you play a card here this turn, destroy the top card of your opponent’s deck.
After you play a card here this turn, banish the top card of your opponent’s deck.

items.name: The Sandbar
changes: Cards that didn’t start in your deck cost 1 more. (max 6)

items.name: Panoptichron
changes: Cards that didn't start in your deck get +2 Power here.
